subject: Home & DIY
title: Garage Door Springs Can Kill
description: A short lesson to help you apply Garage Door Springs Can Kill.

hook.text: A garage door spring holds 200+ pounds of tension. When it snaps, the released energy can break bones or be fatal.

buildup.text: Garage doors weigh 130-400 lbs. Torsion springs above the door counterbalance this weight so the opener barely works.

discovery.text: Springs have a rated life of about 10,000 cyclesâ€”roughly 7-10 years of daily use. They fatigue and fail without warning.

twist.text: DIY spring replacement is the most dangerous common home repair. The springs are under lethal tension during adjustment.

climax.text: Pro replacement costs $150-$300. ERs treat thousands of garage-spring injuries yearly from DIY attempts gone wrong.

punchline.text: The most dangerous thing in your garage isn't the car.

quiz.question: Why is DIY garage door spring replacement especially dangerous?
options: The springs are under lethal tension during adjustment
The door must be held manually while working
